name: Slender Man Chapter 2 Free
description:
Slender Man is back in this all new sequel to the indie mobile hit game Slender Man Chapter 1:Alone. Can you stand the suspense as Slender Man stalks you through 3 all new terrifying, 3D levels? He got some new surprises in store that are sure to make you scream.

Slender Man is a mythical creature often depicted as a tall, thin figure wearing a black suit and a blank face. According to the legend, he can stretch or shorten his arms at will and has tentacle-like appendages protruding from his back. Depending on the interpretations of the myth, the creature can cause memory loss, insomnia, paranoia, coughing fits (nicknamed “slendersickness”), photograph/video distortions and can teleport at will.
